about_the_game:
Introducing Dum Game, a thrilling multiplayer party experience where victory is at stake! Engage in fierce competition as you face off against other players in a series of exhilarating rounds, with only one player emerging as the ultimate champion.

You choose a lobby you want to join, then you compete against others in different gamemodes.
You can collect rewards and items by winning the minigames.
Every lobby has a maximum of 20 players.


[Solo Gamemodes]
- Free For All
- Hide And Seek
- Block Party
- Blocks Fall
- Green Light Red Light
- Parkour
- Bombs Fall
- The Floor Is Lava
- Obstacle Floor
- Memorize
- Shoot Range
- Snow Fight
- Spleef
- Tnt Run
- Sumo
- Obstacle Course

[Team Gamemodes]
- Team Hunt
- Capture Point
- Collect



- 50+ Maps
- Multiplayer
- Custom Character Customization
- Win Rewards
- Achievements

name: Dum Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Experience the exhilaration of Dum Game, a competitive multiplayer party sensation! Outmatch your rivals in thrilling rounds to claim victory and become the ultimate champion.
